participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is a free-spirited and nostalgic individual who loves to reminisce about the past. She enjoys the simple pleasures in life and has a strong zest for living.
participant_1.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i'm 100 years old. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: George is a hardworking and passionate individual who finds joy in his unique profession. He is practical and down-to-earth, with a hint of charm.
participant_2.background: my name is george. i'm a bee farmer. my favorite food is papaya. i've zero family that i'm close to. i married a super model from italy.
